div.p: The free/busy status of an appointment
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/slotstatus

tr.td: Indicates that the time interval is busy because one or more events have been scheduled for that interval.
Indicates that the time interval is free for scheduling.
Indicates that the time interval is busy and that the interval can not be scheduled.
Indicates that the time interval is busy because one or more events have been tentatively scheduled for that interval.

description.value: The free/busy status of an appointment

definition.value: Indicates that the time interval is busy because one or more events have been scheduled for that interval.
Indicates that the time interval is free for scheduling.
Indicates that the time interval is busy and that the interval can not be scheduled.
Indicates that the time interval is busy because one or more events have been tentatively scheduled for that interval.
